landing_message: get fluent in a foreign language. make friends. learn a new culture...all without leaving your city.
landing_quote: “If you talk to a man in a language he understands, that goes to his head.  If you talk to him in his language, that goes to his heart.”
tour: Wanna tour of the site? Use our
name: Name
fun_learning: Learning is more effective when you're having fun. Meeting native speakers of other languages not only increases your fluency but also open doors to new friendships and cultural experiences.
learning: Learning without doing only takes you so far. Fluency is acquired through repetition and imitation. What better way than with a real-life native?
excite: It's exciting to use the language you are learning in a practical way. Plus it's great motivation to keep learning. So start talking your way to fluency!
no_results: Ahh shucks. Your search didn't return any results.
search_heading: Look for exchanges in your area
all_online: See all available online exchanges for:
settle: Why settle for just a city?
